summary: We reviewed the availability of 18 kinds of Army and Marine Corps ground vehicles—including tanks, self-propelled artillery, and armored personnel carriers—to carry out potential missions. Many vehicles weren't fully capable and available for a potential mission. For example, none of the Army vehicles we reviewed met the Army's goal of availability 90% of the time in FY 2024. Since FY 2015, mission capable rates declined...
title: Weapon System Sustainment: Various Challenges Affect Ground Vehicles' Availability for Missions
